body: As we discussed, it won't actually be set to 1 in the streaming case, because it only comes back as part of the recv_initial_metadata op.  But I've added a test that it is not set in a case where there is not a Trailers-Only response.

Setting this aside for now, as per discussion with @ctiller.  We will instead do some experiments to see if it's sufficient to have the transport treat an initial headers frame followed immediately by a trailing headers frame the same as a Trailers-Only response.
